Hartford.Keney Park Golf Course:
Keney Park Golf Course is a public golf course located in Hartford, Connecticut and Windsor, Connecticut within Hartford's Keney Park. The first nine holes were designed by eminent golf architect golf course architect Devereux Emmet in 1927, with the remaining nine made by City of Hartford engineer Robert ”Jack” Ross in 1931.


== History ==
There had been talk of building a golf course in Keney Park as early as 1916 in order to alleviate congestion in Hartford's Goodwin Park.
